resources.string: Hit the slopes!\nBut remember to assess local conditions and individual slopes. If you change plans, remember to recalculate.
The avalanche danger is too high, you need to change your plans to bring the risk down. Somewhere less steep would be a good start.
Seriously, the pub or the sofa is the only safe place today.
